name: Lune (itch) (Xath)
description:
Take on the role of a cat [noon], tasked with protecting the artefact. The cat must use its agility to defeat four different types of enemies, including wolves, birds, slimes and bears, who are all determined to destroy the artefact.

Controls :
  • Move Left - A
  • Move Right - D
  • Attack - F
  • Jump - Space
  • Dash - L.Shift
Enemy :
  • 0 Score - Wolf (2hp) 
  • 50 Score - Crow (1hp)
  • 150 Score - Slime (1hp)  
  • 350 Score - Bear (2hp)
Insight :
  • Double Jump 
  • Wall Climb
  • Stomp Enemy
  • Slime acts as a bounce pad
  • Shield acts as a climbable wall

Engine - Unity
Music by Nojisuma
